amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 117-253 to ensure toxic exposed veterans have access to mammography screenings.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures toxic exposed veterans have access to mammography screenings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 425 - 0 (Roll no. 54).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Brownley.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Brownley amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 425 - 0 (Roll no. 54).
